title: key reservation system
description: System for managing and controlling keys and access permissions at IFSP.
about: Developed as an academic project at IFSP, this system aims to optimize key management between students and staff, ensuring greater security and traceability.

contributions.text: Development of a robust API using Express and Node.js to manage reservations and users.
MySQL database modeling and normalization for efficient storage of access logs.
Full interface prototyping in Figma, focusing on user experience (UX).
